text:
Hi Jon,

Hope your holiday was nice!

It's interesting how different are people journeys to this industry! 

I got recommended a website which looks really good so my plan atm is to sign up to a membership in there (do you know <http://fxphd.com?|fxphd.com?>)  and do all the dmp tutorials I can find for a month. I might possibly shoot some green screen footage since I have the equipment available in my internship. It's quite nice to get inspiration from different studio breakdowns and try to set similar scenes even if in a smaller scale.

As for voluntary work, London is too expensive so I'd probably do that only if worst came to worst and I couldn't get any jobs after the internship. Hopefully that won't be the case.

Did you find it hard or relatively easy to get in the field and where you want to be?
